mapper.update: update tp_user_ali_account set real_name = #{real_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{is_delete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, real_name, mobile, account, user_id, add_time, is_delete from tp_user_ali_account
